fields.name: Catalytic Converter Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Exhaust services where residual catalytic converter parts remain encased in the crankshaft casting, or slightly damaged by improperly cleaned crankcase or reaction wheel surfaces.

fields.name: Exhaust Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Repair or replace broken or misshapen exhaust system parts, including: fins, emitters, gaskets, cylinders, exhaust pipes, etc.

fields.name: Exhaust Manifold Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Repair or replace broken or mangled exhaust system manifolds by clipping and/or replacing seam gas suppressors.

fields.name: Muffler Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Repair or replace other damaged or misfunctional muffler parts.

fields.name: Tailpipe Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Repair or replace other damaged or misfunctional tailpipe parts.

fields.name: AC Belt Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or repairing AC belts to improve their life.

fields.name: Compressor Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or repairing modified, overused or misused or missing gas (O2) compressors.

fields.name: Evaporator Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or repairing evaporators and evaporator bags.

fields.name: Heating & Cooling System Diagnostics
fields.description: Diagnosing or identifying hot and cold evaporator unit issues such as: flue lag, underheating, nozzles, crimping, leaking or cleaning.

fields.name: Cooling System Repair
fields.description: Repairing parts of the cooling system that aren't running highly redundant air/coolant systems, or other, common issues.

fields.name: Heating System Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Repairing a broken or malfunctioning heat exchanger, vector drive, or vector freon converter, or flat-out missing a boost system.

fields.name: Refrigerant Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or repairing refrigerant on air/coolant systems and/or ignition fuel.

fields.name: Alternator Repair & Replacement
fields.description: Repairing/replacing an alternator.

fields.name: Electrical System Diagnostics & Repair
fields.description: Diagnosing or identifying common electrical problems such as fuse blown and distortion in ratings or over voltage/under voltage.

fields.name: Power Antenna Repair
fields.description: Repairing power antenna connectors.

fields.name: Check Engine Light Diagnostics & Repair
fields.description: Using the check-engine light and the inspection light to test engine for smoke, oil, battery problems and other electrical problems.

fields.name: Light Repair & Bulb Replacement
fields.description: Replacing and repairing light bulbs (HOBs) used on electrical systems such as light switches and/or indicator lights.

fields.name: Power Accessory Repair
fields.description: Repairing, exchanging and/or replacing electrical connection accessories such as power cord, lead plug, battery, tensioner and/or fuses.

fields.name: Power Lock Repair
fields.description: Combining the mechanical and electrical parts of a power lock.

fields.name: Power Steering Repair
fields.description: Repairing a power steering system.

fields.name: Power Window Repair
fields.description: Repairing power window's electrical system components.

fields.name: Windshield Wiper Repair
fields.description: Repairing a 'bad load' windshield wiper system

fields.name: Axle Repair & Replacement
fields.description: Complete repair and replacement of axles.

fields.name: Clutch Repair & Replacement
fields.description: Complete repair and replacement of clutches.

fields.name: Differential Diagnosis
fields.description: Identifying or diagnosing problems with the differential flange.

fields.name: Differential Rebuild & Service
fields.description: Troubleshooting disc pads and rotating surfaces to analyze wear patterns and/or performance.

fields.name: Driveline Repair & Maintenance
fields.description: Complete driveline repairs and maintenance.

fields.name: Driveshaft & U-Joint Repair
fields.description: Complete driveline & driveshaft repairs and maintenance.

fields.name: Flywheel Repair & Replacement
fields.description: Repair or replace flywheels.

fields.name: Transmission Fluid Service
fields.description: Repairing, replacing and/or replacing transmission fluid and/or additives.

fields.name: Transmission Flush
fields.description: Installing new transmission fluid.

fields.name: Transmission Repair & Service
fields.description: Replacement and/or repair of damaged, or mis-shaped or incomplete transmission parts.

fields.name: Transmission Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or transferring defective, cracked or damaged parts of a transmission to improve performance.

fields.name: Wheel Balancing
fields.description: Repairing, replacing and repairing wheels to achieve more balanced operation.

fields.name: Tire Installation
fields.description: Attaching, inserting, or adjusting a tire in a tire-mounted vehicle or in a tire-mounted vehicle.

fields.name: Tire Replacement
fields.description: Replacing a tire or a complete tire set - such as a car, truck, van, or SUV.

fields.name: Tire Rotation
fields.description: Complete tire rotation service.

fields.name: Wheel Alignment
fields.description: Aligning the wheels to meet a higher level of specification or to adjust everything on the vehicle properly and according to expectations.

fields.name: Flat Tire Repair
fields.description: Replacing or repairing punctured tires using plugs, patches and/or sealant.

fields.name: Season Tire Change
fields.description: Swapping summer/winter tires on and off of a vehicle.

fields.name: Curb rash repair
fields.description: Repairing a bad 'curb rash' on a wheel or rim.

fields.name: Wheel refinishing/Rim Repair
fields.description: Repairing (or replacing) wheels and/or rims.

fields.name: Timing Belt Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or repairing timing belts.

fields.name: Serpentine Belt Repair/Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or repairing serpentine belts.

fields.name: Drivability Diagnostics & Repair
fields.description: Repairing, exchanging and/or repairing drive shaft or drive internals such as a crankshaft, or an intermediate shaft or a differential cover.

fields.name: Engine Repair
fields.description: Replacing or repairing engine parts.

fields.name: Engine Replacement
fields.description: Replacing or repairing a failed or malfunctioning engine with a more powerful or specific engine - such as diesel engine, gas engine, or an air-engine.

fields.name: Engine Performance Check
fields.description: Replacing or repairing parts related to the engine performance check's electrical connection or engine controller.

fields.name: Fuel Injection Repair & Service
fields.description: Repairing, replacing and/or replacing fuel injector systems and/or filters.

fields.name: Fuel System Repair & Maintenance
fields.description: Repairing, replacing and/or repairing fuel system parts such as fuel tank, fuel gauge, gas tank, gas pump, gas door and/or gas hood.

fields.name: Hose Replacement
fields.description: Replacing and/or repairing rubber hoses and/or vacuum lines.

fields.name: Ignition System Repair & Maintenance
fields.description: Complete ignition system repairs and maintenance.

fields.name: Radiator Repair & Replacement
fields.description: Departure or repair of radiators for maintenance.

fields.name: Water Pump Repair & Replacement
fields.description: Complete repair and replacement of water pumps.

fields.name: Brake Pad Replacement
fields.description: Complete repair and replacement of brake pads.

fields.name: Brake Calliper service
fields.description: Complete repair and replacement of brake callipers.

fields.name: Brake fluid leak
fields.description: Replacing or repairing brake fluid hose, drain plug and/or bolts.

fields.name: Disk rotor resurface
fields.description: Resurfacing disk rotors to improve operation.

fields.name: Shocks & Struts Repair
fields.description: Complete repair and replacement of shock absorbers.

fields.name: Ball joint replacement
fields.description: Ball joint replacement.

fields.name: Factory Scheduled Maintenance
fields.description: Fully implement factory warranties or warranty extensions.

fields.name: Filter Replacements
fields.description: Replacing engine and/or cabin air filters.

fields.name: 12 point Inspection
fields.description: Performing 12-point inspections, including: visual inspections, oil checks, pressure checks, and more.

fields.name: Oil Change
fields.description: Draining old oil out of the engine system and replenishing it with new oil.

fields.name: Windshield Wiper Blades
fields.description: Replacing or repairing windshield wiper blades to improve safety.
